height32._comment: As seen in Wizard page breadcrumbs and Replicas page list item.

height32white._comment: As seen in Dashboard page, Top Endpoints chart tooltip.

height42._comment: As seen in Endpoints page list item.

height64._comment: As seen in Replica Details page and Endpoint Details page.

height128._comment: As seen in New Endpoint modal and Wizard endpoint selection page.

height128disabled._comment: As seen in Wizard endpoint selection page when there's no endpoint for that provider.

oci._comment: Specifying all heights is not required, it will scale to the closest one provided. If there's a no height properties in 'logos', the logo will be scaled to all heights
